sqlQuery.name: ByEstAccession
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT distinct aa.source_id, aa.project_id FROM ApidbTuning.EstAttributes ea, ApidbTuning.AssemblyAttributes aa, ($$est_id$$) ds WHERE LOWER(ea.source_id) LIKE LOWER(REPLACE(REPLACE(ds.source_id,' ',''), '*', '%')) AND ea.assembly_source_id = aa.source_id AND aa.project_id = '@PROJECT_ID@'

sqlQuery.name: ByLibrary
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT aa.source_id, aa.project_id, count(*) as est_library_count FROM ApidbTuning.EstAttributes ea, ApidbTuning.AssemblyAttributes aa WHERE aa.source_id = ea.assembly_source_id AND ea.library_id in ($$libraryIdAssemblies$$) AND ea.assembly_est_count >= $$min_ests_in_assembly$$ AND aa.project_id = '@PROJECT_ID@' GROUP BY aa.source_id, aa.project_id HAVING count(*) >= $$min_lib_ests_in_assembly$$

sqlQuery.name: ByLocation
sqlQuery.sql:
select * from ( SELECT eags.source_id, '@PROJECT_ID@' as project_id, apidb.tab_to_string(set( CAST( COLLECT(s.source_id || ':' || trim(to_char(b.target_start,'999,999,999')) || '-' || trim(to_char(b.target_end,'999,999,999')) || '(' || decode(b.is_reversed,0,'+',1,'-',null) || ')') AS apidb.varchartab)), ', ') AS assembly_location FROM ApidbTuning.AsmAlignmentGeneSUMMARY eags, ApidbTuning.BlatAlignmentLocation b, dots.NASEQUENCE s WHERE lower(s.source_id) = lower($$sequenceId$$) AND s.na_sequence_id = b.target_na_sequence_id AND b.target_start >= REGEXP_REPLACE('$$start_point$$', ',| ','') AND (b.target_end <= REGEXP_REPLACE('$$end_point$$', ',| ','') OR REGEXP_REPLACE('$$end_point$$', ',| ','') = 0) AND b.is_consistent in ($$high_confidence_only$$) AND b.is_best_alignment in ($$best_alignment_only$$) AND b.percent_identity >= $$min_percent_identity$$ AND b.blat_alignment_id = eags.BLAT_ALIGNMENT_ID AND eags.percent_assembly_bases_aligned >= $$min_percent_assembly_aligned$$ AND eags.est_count >= $$min_ests_in_assembly$$ GROUP BY eags.source_id)
/* AND target_start >= REGEXP_REPLACE('$$start_point$$', ',| ','') AND (target_end <= REGEXP_REPLACE('$$end_point$$', ',| ','') OR REGEXP_REPLACE('$$end_point$$', ',| ','') = 0) AND is_consistent in ($$high_confidence_only$$) AND is_best_alignment in ($$best_alignment_only$$) AND percent_identity >= $$min_percent_identity$$ AND percent_assembly_bases_aligned >= $$min_percent_assembly_aligned$$ AND est_count >= $$min_ests_in_assembly$$ GROUP BY source_id ) */

select * from ( SELECT eags.source_id, '@PROJECT_ID@' as project_id, apidb.tab_to_string(set( CAST( COLLECT(sa.source_id || ':' || trim(to_char(b.target_start,'999,999,999')) || '-' || trim(to_char(b.target_end,'999,999,999')) || '(' || decode(b.is_reversed,0,'+',1,'-',null) || ')') AS apidb.varchartab)), ', ') AS assembly_location FROM ApidbTuning.AsmAlignmentGeneSUMMARY eags, ApidbTuning.BlatAlignmentLocation b, ApidbTuning.SequenceAttributes sa WHERE (( sa.chromosome = $$chromosomeOptional$$ and sa.organism = $$organism$$) OR lower(sa.source_id) = lower($$sequenceId$$)) AND sa.na_sequence_id = b.target_na_sequence_id AND b.target_start >= REGEXP_REPLACE('$$start_point$$', ',| ','') AND (b.target_end <= REGEXP_REPLACE('$$end_point$$', ',| ','') OR REGEXP_REPLACE('$$end_point$$', ',| ','') = 0) AND b.is_consistent in ($$high_confidence_only$$) AND b.is_best_alignment in ($$best_alignment_only$$) AND b.percent_identity >= $$min_percent_identity$$ AND b.blat_alignment_id = eags.BLAT_ALIGNMENT_ID AND eags.percent_assembly_bases_aligned >= $$min_percent_assembly_aligned$$ AND eags.est_count >= $$min_ests_in_assembly$$ GROUP BY eags.source_id)

sqlQuery.name: withGeneOverlap
sqlQuery.sql: select * from ( SELECT source_id, '@PROJECT_ID@' as project_id, CASE WHEN count(*) > 20 THEN count(*)||' locations' ELSE apidb.tab_to_string(set( CAST( COLLECT(target_sequence_source_id || ':' || trim(to_char(target_start,'999,999,999')) || '-' || trim(to_char(target_end,'999,999,999')) || '(' || decode(is_reversed,0,'+',1,'-',null) || ')') AS apidb.varchartab)), ', ') END AS assembly_locations, CASE WHEN count(distinct gene) > 20 THEN count(distinct gene)||' genes' ELSE apidb.tab_to_string(set(CAST(COLLECT(gene) AS apidb.varchartab)), ', ') END as genes FROM ( SELECT i.source_id,i.gene ,i.target_start,i.target_end, i.is_reversed, i.target_sequence_source_id FROM ApidbTuning.AsmAlignmentGeneSUMMARY i,ApidbTuning.SequenceAttributes sa WHERE i.is_consistent in ($$high_confidence_only$$) AND sa.organism in ($$organismWithAssemblies$$) AND sa.na_sequence_id = i.target_na_sequence_id AND i.is_best_alignment in ($$best_alignment_only$$) AND i.percent_identity >= $$min_percent_identity$$ AND i.percent_assembly_bases_aligned >= $$min_percent_assembly_aligned$$ AND i.est_count >= $$min_ests_in_assembly$$ $$overlapOrNot$$ SELECT i.source_id,i.gene ,i.target_start,i.target_end, i.is_reversed, i.target_sequence_source_id FROM ApidbTuning.AsmAlignmentGeneSUMMARY i,ApidbTuning.SequenceAttributes sa WHERE i.assembly_gene_overlap_length >= $$bp_overlap_gte$$ AND sa.organism in ($$organismWithAssemblies$$) AND sa.na_sequence_id = i.target_na_sequence_id AND i.is_consistent in ($$high_confidence_only$$) AND i.is_best_alignment in ($$best_alignment_only$$) AND i.percent_identity >= $$min_percent_identity$$ AND i.percent_assembly_bases_aligned >= $$min_percent_assembly_aligned$$ AND i.est_count >= $$min_ests_in_assembly$$ ) GROUP BY source_id )

select t.* from ( SELECT source_id, '@PROJECT_ID@' as project_id, CASE WHEN count(*) > 20 THEN count(*)||' locations' ELSE apidb.tab_to_string(set( CAST( COLLECT(target_sequence_source_id || ':' || trim(to_char(target_start,'999,999,999')) || '-' || trim(to_char(target_end,'999,999,999')) || '(' || decode(is_reversed,0,'+',1,'-',null) || ')') AS apidb.varchartab)), ', ') END AS assembly_locations, CASE WHEN count(distinct gene) > 20 THEN count(distinct gene)||' genes' ELSE apidb.tab_to_string(set(CAST(COLLECT(gene) AS apidb.varchartab)), ', ') END as genes FROM ( SELECT i.source_id,i.gene ,i.target_start,i.target_end, i.is_reversed, i.target_sequence_source_id FROM ApidbTuning.AsmAlignmentGeneSUMMARY i,ApidbTuning.SequenceAttributes sa WHERE i.is_consistent in ($$high_confidence_only$$) AND sa.organism in ($$organismWithAssemblies$$) AND sa.na_sequence_id = i.target_na_sequence_id AND i.is_best_alignment in ($$best_alignment_only$$) AND i.percent_identity >= $$min_percent_identity$$ AND i.percent_assembly_bases_aligned >= $$min_percent_assembly_aligned$$ AND i.est_count >= $$min_ests_in_assembly$$ $$overlapOrNot$$ SELECT i.source_id,i.gene ,i.target_start,i.target_end, i.is_reversed, i.target_sequence_source_id FROM ApidbTuning.AsmAlignmentGeneSUMMARY i,ApidbTuning.SequenceAttributes sa WHERE i.assembly_gene_overlap_length >= $$bp_overlap_gte$$ AND sa.organism in ($$organismWithAssemblies$$) AND sa.na_sequence_id = i.target_na_sequence_id AND i.is_consistent in ($$high_confidence_only$$) AND i.is_best_alignment in ($$best_alignment_only$$) AND i.percent_identity >= $$min_percent_identity$$ AND i.percent_assembly_bases_aligned >= $$min_percent_assembly_aligned$$ AND i.est_count >= $$min_ests_in_assembly$$ ) GROUP BY source_id ) t, ApidbTuning.AssemblyAttributes bfmv WHERE bfmv.project_id='@PROJECT_ID@' and bfmv.source_id = t.source_id

select * from ( SELECT source_id, '@PROJECT_ID@' as project_id, CASE WHEN count(*) > 20 THEN count(*)||' locations' ELSE apidb.tab_to_string(set( CAST( COLLECT(target_sequence_source_id || ':' || trim(to_char(target_start,'999,999,999')) || '-' || trim(to_char(target_end,'999,999,999')) || '(' || decode(is_reversed,0,'+',1,'-',null) || ')') AS apidb.varchartab)), ', ') END AS assembly_locations, CASE WHEN count(distinct gene) > 20 THEN count(distinct gene)||' genes' ELSE apidb.tab_to_string(set(CAST(COLLECT(gene) AS apidb.varchartab)), ', ') END as genes FROM ( SELECT i.source_id,i.gene ,i.target_start,i.target_end, i.is_reversed, i.target_sequence_source_id FROM ApidbTuning.AsmAlignmentGeneSUMMARY i, ApidbTuning.SequenceAttributes sa WHERE sa.organism in ($$organismWithAssemblies$$) AND sa.na_sequence_id = i.target_na_sequence_id AND i.is_consistent in ($$high_confidence_only$$) AND i.is_best_alignment in ($$best_alignment_only$$) AND i.percent_identity >= $$min_percent_identity$$ AND i.percent_assembly_bases_aligned >= $$min_percent_assembly_aligned$$ AND i.est_count >= $$min_ests_in_assembly$$ $$overlapOrNot$$ SELECT i.source_id,i.gene ,i.target_start,i.target_end, i.is_reversed, i.target_sequence_source_id FROM ApidbTuning.AsmAlignmentGeneSUMMARY i, ApidbTuning.SequenceAttributes sa WHERE sa.organism in ($$organismWithAssemblies$$) AND sa.na_sequence_id = i.target_na_sequence_id AND i.assembly_gene_overlap_length >= $$bp_overlap_gte$$ AND i.is_consistent in ($$high_confidence_only$$) AND i.is_best_alignment in ($$best_alignment_only$$) AND i.percent_identity >= $$min_percent_identity$$ AND i.percent_assembly_bases_aligned >= $$min_percent_assembly_aligned$$ AND i.est_count >= $$min_ests_in_assembly$$ ) GROUP BY source_id )

sqlQuery.name: ByGeneIDs
sqlQuery.sql:
select * from ( SELECT source_id, '@PROJECT_ID@' as project_id, CASE WHEN count(*) > 20 THEN count(*)||' locations' ELSE apidb.tab_to_string(set( CAST( COLLECT(target_sequence_source_id || ':' || trim(to_char(target_start,'999,999,999')) || '-' || trim(to_char(target_end,'999,999,999')) || '(' || decode(is_reversed,0,'+',1,'-',null) || ')') AS apidb.varchartab)), ', ') END AS assembly_locations, CASE WHEN count(distinct gene) > 20 THEN count(distinct gene)||' genes' ELSE apidb.tab_to_string(set(CAST(COLLECT(gene) AS apidb.varchartab)), ', ') END as genes FROM (
SELECT distinct i.source_id,i.gene ,i.target_start,i.target_end, i.is_reversed, i.target_sequence_source_id FROM ApidbTuning.AsmAlignmentGeneSUMMARY i, ApidbTuning.GeneId gi WHERE gi.id LIKE REGEXP_REPLACE(REPLACE(LOWER($$single_gene_id$$), '*', '%'), '[[:space:]]', '') AND i.gene = gi.gene AND i.assembly_gene_overlap_length >= $$bp_overlap_gte$$ AND is_consistent in ($$high_confidence_only$$) AND is_best_alignment in ($$best_alignment_only$$) AND percent_identity >= $$min_percent_identity$$ AND percent_assembly_bases_aligned >= $$min_percent_assembly_aligned$$ AND est_count >= $$min_ests_in_assembly$$ ) GROUP BY source_id )

sqlQuery.name: ByWeightFilter
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT a.source_id, a.project_id, a.wdk_weight FROM $$assembly_result$$ a WHERE a.wdk_weight >= $$min_weight$$ AND a.wdk_weight <= $$max_weight$$
